Key Match Events: Pittsburgh Pirates beat the Miami Marlins 3-1 for a sweep of the season series
Jared Triolo extended the lead to 3-0 with his eighth homer of the season
Others: Bailey Falter carried a no-hitter into the seventh inning
Jonathan Berm√∫dez got through two innings for Miami, allowing three runs and three hits with one walk in his first major-league start
Jonah Bride dropped a single into left field with one out in the seventh, breaking Falter's no-hitter
Others (continued): David Bednar pitched the ninth but could not pick up his first save since Aug. 23
Otto Lopez led off with a double before Jake Burger reached on an error by shortstop Isiah Kiner-Falefa
Jalen Beeks came in for Bednar, allowing an infield single to Stowers that loaded the bases
Xavier Edwards flew out to right for his 10th save
